mapper.select: SELECT recNo, writer, petNo, category, title, content, reg FROM rec ORDER BY reg DESC

SELECT recNo, writer, petNo, category, title, content, reg FROM rec
petNo = #{petNo}
AND reg >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND reg < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND category IN
('밥', '간식')
('배변', '배뇨')
('병원', '약')
('활동')
ORDER BY reg DESC
SELECT recNo, writer, petNo, category, title, content, reg, imgPath FROM rec WHERE recNo = #{recNo}
